Herewith a listing of the major publications and records which
the National Association of Educational Broadcasters has
available for distribution to the membership and the general
public.
Order blanks are included. Any of the materials listed may be
ordered from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters.
(REVISED EDITION. DISCARD ALL PREVIOUS LISTS. PRICES INDICATED
IN PREVIOUS LISTS NO LONGER APPLICABLE.)
The National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Revised, February, 1962
